    portfolio

    publications

    Identifying sensors-based parameters associated with fall risk in community-dwelling older adults: an investigation and interpretation of discriminatory parameters

    Published in BMC Geriatrics, 2024

    This research investigates sensor-based parameters that can help predict fall risk in older adults, aiming to improve preventive strategies.

    Recommended citation: Wang X., Cao J., Zhao Q., et al. (2024). "Identifying sensors-based parameters associated with fall risk in community-dwelling older adults: an investigation and interpretation of discriminatory parameters." BMC Geriatrics.
    Download Paper

    Assessing and projecting the global burden of thyroid cancer 1990–2030: Analysis of the Global Burden of Disease Study

    Published in Journal of Global Health, 2024

    This study provides an in-depth analysis of the global burden of thyroid cancer from 1990 to 2030, using data from the Global Burden of Disease Study.

    Recommended citation: Zhao Q., Chen M., Fu L., Yang Y., & Zhan Y. (2024). "Assessing and projecting the global burden of thyroid cancer 1990–2030: Analysis of the Global Burden of Disease Study." Journal of Global Health.
    Download Paper

    MSS-Former: Multi-Scale Skeletal Transformer for Intelligent Fall Risk Prediction in Older Adults

    Published in IEEE Internet of Things Journal, 2024

    This paper presents a multi-scale skeletal transformer model designed to predict fall risk in older adults, leveraging deep learning techniques to analyze skeletal data.

    Recommended citation: Zhao Q., Fan X., Chen M., et al. (2024). "MSS-Former: Multi-Scale Skeletal Transformer for Intelligent Fall Risk Prediction in Older Adults." IEEE Internet of Things Journal.
    Download Paper

    MIEFP-Net: A Multimodal Image-Enhanced Network for Fall Prediction Using IMU Data

    Under review in 15th ACM Conference on Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, and Health Informatics, 2024

    This working paper presents the MIEFP-Net, a multimodal image-enhanced network designed for fall prediction using IMU data.

    Recommended citation: Zhao Q., Chen M., & Zhao Y. (2024). "MIEFP-Net: A Multimodal Image-Enhanced Network for Fall Prediction Using IMU Data." 15th ACM Conference on Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, and Health Informatics.
    Download Paper
